body:
Milod @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=84294#p83769 reports

fiend hunter exiled my bloodcrazed neonate (equiped with sword of war and peace and 1 counter and tapped) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Fiend Hunter should not be able to target creature equipped with Sword of War and Peace as it grants protection from white.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Fiend hunter able to target creature equipped with Sword of War and Peace

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 7bcd715deea7 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on March 05, 2012 23:21:16_

Milod @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=84294#p83769 reports

fiend hunter exiled my bloodcrazed neonate (equiped with sword of war and peace and 1 counter and tapped) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Fiend Hunter should not be able to target creature equipped with Sword of War and Peace as it grants protection from white.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=176_
